Package mireka.forward

Provides support for address expansion for multiple delivery.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ForwardDestination A ForwardDestination assigned to a recipient indicates that the mail should be redistributed to multiple recipients, without changing the reverse path.
ForwardList ForwardList redistributes mail to multiple recipients without changing the reverse path.
ForwardLists ForwardLists is a collection of forward lists, used in the configuration files.
Member Member holds information about a mailing or forward list member.
Srs The Srs class implements the Sender Rewriting Scheme (SRS), which makes possible to forward mail without breaking SPF checks.
SrsDestination An SrsDestination assigned to a recipient indicates that the mail must be forwarded to a remote address, which is specified in the Sender Rewriting Scheme (SRS) compatible local part of the recipient address.
SrsRecipientSpecification Matches any recipient which seems to be an SRS reverse path.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidSrsException Thrown if a seemingly SRS compatible reverse path has illegal syntax, expired, or has invalid digital signature.
 

Package mireka.forward Description

Provides support for address expansion for multiple delivery.

See Also:
RFC 5321 3.9.1 Alias
